website_summaries.verdict: If inserts with softer support help your plantar fasciitis issues, these may be the best insoles for you.
pros: Podiatrist-designed with cushioning that absorbs shock and anti-microbial material that inhibits the growth of bacteria
cons: Users who prefer firmer support found them too soft
Material is a bit flimsy and compresses easily

customer_reviews.title: VIVA los VIVE
customer_reviews.text: Public Announcement: I have that flattest feet & no arch. I also have Siactica & Scoliosis,if u don't know what that means (curve of the spine) so back pain is a daily struggle with me. Since I have purchased these inserts,about a week ago. I have absolutely not,had any back discomfort while walking with these insoles. U can think what u want about this review. No one is paying me,I want people like me who are experiencing foot pain,back pain & heel. To know that these is the insoles to purchase. Viva los VIVE😂
customer_reviews.author: Can'tTrustNoOne😔

customer_reviews.title: Best Insoles!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. At first I thought they were too firm for my feet, but it just felt that way because I had been walking improperly my entire life. Now that my feet have adjusted to proper alignment they feel better than they ever have! Also I'd just like to address some of these negative reviews I read. INSOLES ARE NOT A LIFETIME PRODUCT. I read one where somebody said their pair degraded after 2 months of using them everyday (even while working out). Of course this much use is going to wear your insoles down... hence the 60 day warranty. Don't let these simpletons stop you from purchasing an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Stowe

customer_reviews.title: Arch support is too hard for me.  Can't use them because they are uncomfortable for my arches.
customer_reviews.text: Arch support is too hard for me. Can't use them because they are uncomfortable for my arches. I'm giving 3 stars only because it might be a good product for other people. I think the product description should emphasis that these have high arch supports that are firm and do not conform to your foot as a softer material might. I bought them to replace the inner soles of my New Balance walking shoes. Felt like a rock under my arches. I didn't request a return since I had to trim them to fit my shoe size 11 1/2. Had ordered XL size.
customer_reviews.author: anybody can relate

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended. Bottom pieces come off after one month
customer_reviews.text: Started out ok. The arch support was a tad too much at first but I got used to it. However after about a month, the dark green patches came off from under the sole and now I can feel the voids left behind when I walk. Overall these were not very good soles due to barely lasting a month before falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: David Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent insoles!
customer_reviews.text: I have been fighting with Plantar Fasciitis for a few weeks now, but have it quite frequently. I have bought special shoes, wore shoes that I had that supposedly helped prevent/alleviate it. All to no avail. I received these and wore them for 1 shift at work and my pain was finally gone!! It supports in just the right spots. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: As you may see in the picture of the product, there is the main body of the insert with some smaller patches of material on the heel and toward the front of the foot. Those patches of material fell right off within less than a day of wearing them. Less than one day. I guess the heat from my body melted whatever glue was holding them in place. I tacked them back on, but they just fall right off again. Otherwise I really wanted to like these and give them a higher review. The shape of the insoles is fine, just too bad they fall apart so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Peopleperson

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your feet happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I had plantar fasciitis really bad a few years ago and found out how painful it is. If you've ever had it, and had to get a cortisone shot in your heel and nothing seems to work, you will use, buy and try anything you can find to avoid it again, once it heals. My podiatrist says to wear supportive shoes and orthotics do help, especially if you are exercising. My husband and I joined a gym last year and I really wanted to avoid pain coming back, so I got these to place in my gym shoes. So far, they are doing their job and my feet and I are happy and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Miller

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I was not able to test thse out as they were considerably larger than the size listed. I bought a size small, which is labeled to fit womens shoe size 6.5-8. I wear 7.5 and it is not even close to fitting inside my tennis shoes, let alone dress shoes. Just for reference, I also tried them in my sosters size 8.5 shoes and the insert would not fit. Are they supposed to be cut to fit the shoe size? I will try and order a size down and hope that it will fit my shoes better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Vionic insoles and they are very good, but very pricey. I thought I would try these insoles just to see how they would feel. I am a diabetic and my feet hurt most of the time. I was truly surprised when I tried these insoles. My feet don't hurt, and these insoles cost so much less. I have found my nirvana. Thank you so much from my hurting, or do not hurt anymore feet!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia D. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: These are incredible.
customer_reviews.text: These have saved my life, I was starting to think I'd need surgery or something, and then I started wearing these. Noticeable relief from day one, though my arches started aching for the first couple weeks as these forced my feet into the proper shape. That went away, and so did my foot pain, and now I'm not afraid of going to work every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M

customer_reviews.title: Worn for a month, hurt knees and hips
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these because I was hoping it would actually treat my plantar Fasciitis by adjusting my arch... So I wore them for a month and I finally had to give up today. The balls of my feet are in horrific pain and so are my knees and hips. None of those things hurt before wearing these inserts. I expected my feet to hurt while they adjusted, but I've been in constant pain for the last week so I'm throwing in the towel. Unfortunately I threw away the packaging so I can't return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much cured my plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: When you first get these, they are not comfortable. It takes a week or two to break them in and then they are gold. I have a pair of house shoes that I have these insoles in. At the first hint of plantar fasciitis pain, I slip these on and it's almost instant relief. Forget going to a podiatrist just to get a prescription for superfeet for $50, just buy these and wear them regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great insole, and great price
customer_reviews.text: This insole seems to have helped my Plantar F pain. I’ve tried several different insoles, but these seem to work the best. They last quite awhile, and you can’t beat the price. They come with a size indicator molded in, allowing you to trim to your correct size with scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Red Dog

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: So far the insoles feel okay. I use them in athletic shoes for aerobic activity and weight training. Had bad plantar fascitis last year, and treatment for it, so I keep an insole in all my shoes. Wish the arch support was made from hard plastic rather than dense foam which can break down quickly. Wish insole also had a molded shape to the ball of foot and toe area, rather than flat foam. Hard to find the perfect insole, but this one seems adequate for my needs right now. Can't see it lasting longer than a few months, however.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not working for me
customer_reviews.text: Not working for me. While they do feel supportive in the arch, there’s a very pronounced arch just in front of my heel that’s causing pain I didn’t have before. It feels like a block under the middle of my foot. Looking into returning them and hopefully Vivehealth will stand by the unconditional guarantee
customer_reviews.author: Somebody

customer_reviews.title: Just ordered my second pair.
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around Amazon to see what other options were available because I have not looked in a while (May 2017). After browsing through the top rated, I ordered my second pair since mine seem to help a lot before I wore them out. The soles stayed intact for me the whole time. My feet at extremely flat, and these soles seems to help relieve the stress.
customer_reviews.author: Nalis

customer_reviews.title: Should be included in every new shoe made
customer_reviews.text: These insoles are outstanding. They have just the right amount of support literally everywhere, and are a very good value. I don't think there's any room for improvement, and I will buy them as long as the company continues making them.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Okay - But There are Better Choices
customer_reviews.text: I bought these insoles and another pair to see about getting relief from Plantar Fasciitis. These have a raised instep support and gel pads for the heel and toes, but they are not very comfortable. The instep support is too thick and the gel pads are too thin. The remainder of the insoles are okay, but unremarkable.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: I love the insoles, now leave me alone.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these insoles. They compared to the ones I got from my doctor and to Vionic insoles very well, but for a better price. I have bought them twice now. The only reason I give them four stars is because of the incessant emails from the owner. It is really annoying. They are constantly asking if they can help and asking for a feedback. Your product is great, but your service is annoying. If you buy this, be prepared for junk email.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Röckins

customer_reviews.title: They Saved my 100 Dollar Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I bought sneakers whose soles turned out to be insufficient for my comfort. I bought those insoles, and I can't stop feeling an incredible amount of relief. I have to have orthopedic shoes due to my Charcot Marie Tooth Disease. Because of this genetic disorder, I have an abnormally high arch. When I put those insoles inside those uncomfortable shoes, I felt an extreme amount of relief.
customer_reviews.author: Alina O.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help with my sore feet and they made them worse. The arch on the insole is so high that it feels like I was walking with a river rock in my shoe. I buy a lot of stuff on Amazon and this non-refundable insole is likely the worst purchase I've made. I also purchased insoles from another manufacturer so that I could make sure it wasn't just me--the other insoles were tons better! If you're thinking about buying these, you should probably keep looking (unless you like walking on river rocks).
customer_reviews.author: Silverliningboy

customer_reviews.title: Give them a try
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these inserts hoping to find something that would help me with my very sore feet. After wearing these for a few days, I could feel a difference in how my feet felt at the end of the day. I have an expensive pair of custom orthotics ; however the pain in my feet after a long day at work was still a problem. These are very supportive for my plantar fasciitis. I am glad that I read the other reviews.These work for me. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: stevied

customer_reviews.title: Superfeet?
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe inserts I've ever bought, I have plantar fasciitis & my doc recommended I buy "Superfeet" but I COULDN'T afford them, I'm assuming these probably work just as well.
customer_reviews.author: BrEEndA

customer_reviews.title: Terrible they wrecked 2 weeks of healing in 1 day
customer_reviews.text: I got these to replace a worn out set of inserts after the bone in ,y left foot finally moved and caused a great deal of pain. I was very careful for a few weeks, the pain was finally residing and after I put these in, they re-wrecked my foot after two days. I can point directly at these as nothing else had changed in my life. They are stiff and there is no padding at all.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Brownell

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a help for my plantar fasciitis--I'm a teacher--on my feet all day long. These gave arch support, but the heel was not cushioned enough for me to want to wear these all day--too much pressure on a tender heel. :( Good for arch support. Bad for heel cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: alishas

customer_reviews.title: My Feet Are SOOOOOOOOOOO Happy! Glad I found an insole supplier to extend the lives of my shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I walk 2+ miles each day in shoes so the default insoles that come with my shoes are often worn out after just a few months. Although my shoes look brand new on the outside, my feet would hurt during and after work until I bought these insoles & put them in my shoes. The design does feel a little different at first, but you get used to it and it makes them more durable. After using for a month, I don't notice any wear on the insoles.
customer_reviews.author: John Dough

customer_reviews.title: Rigid Arch Support
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for relief for my plantar fasciitis from these insoles based upon the reviews. There was some relief in that area but the trade off was discomfort from the built-in arch support. The arch support was too rigid for my foot. I felt the arch support all day long as you would feel if there was something in your shoe that did not belong there. On the upside, the manufacturer and Amazon were terrific in handling the guarantee. The manufacturer recommended this product instead for a softer arch support:
customer_reviews.author: Jcsandco

customer_reviews.title: These insoles are great. My pain was getting worse and worse
customer_reviews.text: These insoles are great. My pain was getting worse and worse, to the point where it was almost constant, so I finally had to search for something. I found these on a top 10 list for insoles and they definitely live up to the reputation. I wore them for a full day and could definitely feel them pressing on my feet in different way than the insoles that came with my shoes. I woke up the next day and I had almost zero pain. I have been wearing these for a little over a week and my feet feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Ganyer

customer_reviews.title: I have been wearing them for one week at a physically demanding job and so far they are great. No issues with walking and no mor
customer_reviews.text: I have lived with plantar fasciitis for many years and have tried various insoles and orthotics. I was impressed with the reviews for these insoles and the price so I decided to give them a try. I have been wearing them for one week at a physically demanding job and so far they are great. No issues with walking and no morning foot pain. They are not quite as rigid as the insoles I usually use so I am a bit concerned about longevity, but so far I have no complaints. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ceci

customer_reviews.title: What a relief!
customer_reviews.text: Pain relief, comfort, support are just a few adjectives to describe the ViveSole Plantar Fasciitis Orthotic Shoe Insoles. The insoles are perfect for Walking, Running, and Exercising. If you have discomfort from plantar fasciitis, this product is worthy of a try since it supported my arch, spread my toes and cupped my heel. I found relief from pain with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Support works
customer_reviews.text: These insoles feel wonderful. Lots of support. BUT the material is rather slippery where my foot touches it so I slip a bit. Maybe it is my foot - one being a little smaller than the other. No matter. I love the arch support so I'll just try to rough it up a bit. And buy more. Can't beat the support.
customer_reviews.author: Reader1

customer_reviews.title: Long day wear less foot pain.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for 511 tactical boots I wear for 12 hour shifts. They are magic inserts. Really the end of the day foot pain reduced by 80%.
customer_reviews.author: Danimal

customer_reviews.title: Life changing supports
customer_reviews.text: I have very flat feet. I cannot walk around my house for more than a couple of hours without arch supports before my feet start to hurt. My whole life I've gone through many many different kinds of arch supports, some of them costing upwards of $100! THESE ARE THE BEST! My life feels better now.
customer_reviews.author: DCB

customer_reviews.title: excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when the product came, as it was not soft and gel-ee. And I had to cut it to fit in my shoes. But once I wore it, the benefits jumped out. Mu pain was substantially less. Now, will it help heal my foot - probably not, but I am using a roller, a torture ball, and ice and it is getting gradually better. so I am happy with this insert.
customer_reviews.author: Russell L. Henkel

customer_reviews.title: Not Ultimate Solution For Me
customer_reviews.text: Have not received relief I expected as many reviewers proclaimed VIVEsole for Plantar are okay for a couple of hours while on feet then effectiveness seems to dissipate dramatically. Although sharp piercing pain does not fully return troublesome discomfort remains during the day. This is my fourth brand after eight weeks of hobbling around with plantar faciitis - none have given me daylong relief as I continue to regularly stretch and message heel, as well. I do not believe that over the counter orthotics are going to be my solution to relief.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus

customer_reviews.title: Feel good but not for long
customer_reviews.text: They're very comfortable when they are new and fresh from the package, but the foam compresses quickly. Being on me feet 40+ hours a week and walking 12,000-18,000 steps a day in these, they wear out after about a month and no longer provide relief. I wish they lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad case of Plantar Fasciitis and have been without inserts for a little too long, so the jury is still out on these. I am wearing them every day and it seems that it may have helped some, but the discomfort is really bad. I'll try to remember to come back after another week or two to update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Fitting Inserts for anyone with sore Feet!
customer_reviews.text: These inserts fit my shoes well and seem to last good too! The price is in the medium range but well worth the money. Thanks! You have a happy customer! Irena in Montana
customer_reviews.author: warren Oie

customer_reviews.title: I think they'll be great for that
customer_reviews.text: Helped some, but I have flat feet, and I could notice the arches, and were a little uncomfortable for me. I bought them for soccer shoes, and I think I'm going to switch them to my grass soccer shoes that have no support, I think they'll be great for that. I bought this mainly for the pounding my feet take during the game, and while helps, not the ideal insole for that, IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Hellum

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Inserted them in New Balance Athletic shoes and the very first time I wore them, the turquoise pieces (special padding) came loose. In each shoe I had the ball of the foot section up by my toes and the heel piece behind my heel. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gary H.

customer_reviews.title: Plantar Fascitis Insoles relieve foot pain
customer_reviews.text: I frequently have foot pain, so I purchased the plantar fasciitis insoles to cushion my feet and support my arch. They slipped easily into my shoes. At first the pronounced arch support was a bit difficult to get used to, but now my feet hurt less, so I would have to say this was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic affordable orthotics
customer_reviews.text: after using the same orthotics for ages much to the dismay of my PT she finally convinced to invest in a new pair. I've had ankle, hip, and knee surgery along with back problems. I have flat feet and over flexibility in my joints leads me to favor the ins of my feet. I've used these for the past 3 weeks just in the gym and the difference is incredible. I can get through a workout without my feet curling in pain and feel so much more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Arch is very high
customer_reviews.text: The arch was way too high on these insoles, to the point where it hurt my feet after walking in them all day. I'm almost flat-footed though, so if you have a high arch they might be ok for you. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Vic B

customer_reviews.title: Made the pain in the heal of my foot even worse. Dr Scholl's running insoles with the shock absorb ...
customer_reviews.text: These hurt my feet within an hour to the point I couldn't stand it. Even after adjusting several times. Made the pain in the heal of my foot even worse. Dr Scholl's running insoles with the shock absorb was much better at pain relief for long hours on my feet on concrete floors.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie M. Green

customer_reviews.title: I have really bad feet do I'm praying these help
customer_reviews.text: These came right on time and fit well in my shoes. I have really bad feet do I'm praying these help. So far the arches seem steep so we shall see. I will update in a few weeks. Update: well it's been a few weeks and I have to say these did nothing for my foot issues I'm still in immense pain.
customer_reviews.author: Safirblu

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.  Only lasted 2 wearings before padding compressed
customer_reviews.text: These insoles are worth what you pay for them: Very little. The problem is that the foam padding compresses very quickly. Very quickly in my case being 2 wearings. I bought them because of heel pain, wanted some padding. They were good for about 10~ 15 miles of walking speed hiking wearing trail runners and not carrying much of a load. That is not enough life for insoles.
customer_reviews.author: powerpackager

customer_reviews.title: Hepled me to get rid of the pain.
customer_reviews.text: I was informed by a Doctor that I had Plantar Fascitis and I purchased these to see if they would assist. One word AMAZING, I've ordered another 2 pairs so I can put them in more shoes. I love walking and these have helped me to get rid of the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Joy

customer_reviews.title: They squeak
customer_reviews.text: This product is good. The arch is a little hi9gher then others. They issue is that they squeak. I never had that issue before with any orthotics.
customer_reviews.author: BLP

customer_reviews.title: Foot pain
customer_reviews.text: I have large flat feet. I have used different type of supports for years. I have in all my shoes for comfort and to decrease foot pain. Recommend. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: gene botwright

customer_reviews.title: These are great quality inserts
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality inserts. My reason for giving 4 stars is how thick they are. While this would typically be a good thing it makes my shoes (flats) much tighter. Would be great in an athletic shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great insole
customer_reviews.text: My son has flat feet. He loves these insoles for daily use as well as for sports. So far seem to be holding up pretty well (maybe even better than the expensive custom made ones from the doctor)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't have any problems with my feet, I ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any problems with my feet, I bought this for comfort only. The arches are almost too high for me, and the teal bits on the bottom of the insert came off and seem to have been attached with glue. They did add some comfort to my boots, but overall I would not buy again. If you do have 'plantar fasciitis' I guess its a different story.
customer_reviews.author: college student from CA

customer_reviews.title: Simple - they work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of VIVEsole - Cross Trainer inserts. My family physician told me the shoe repair store to visit since he also has a problem with plantar faciitis. Cross Trainer inserts did not work for plantar faciitis. So I looked for tie right ones and found these. Everyday my foot feels better. These inserts do work and I am grateful that I found them. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Fox

customer_reviews.title: My feet have never felt better. I used Dr
customer_reviews.text: My feet have never felt better. I used Dr. Schoels all day work from Walmart and those worked okay for a little while but my feet still hurt at the end of an 8 hour shift. I didn't have any trouble with these after a couple weeks. Takes a couple days to break them in but definitely will continue to purchase these.
customer_reviews.author: stephen pope

customer_reviews.title: I got these for my husband and he loves them ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband and he loves them! He has been having a lot of trouble lately with Plantar Fasciitis and has to walk around on hard concrete all day, By the time he got home he was so sore and tired he didn't do much else. He has been using these insoles and and the relife is very noticeable! He has more energy and less pain~ he is back to himself hunting and fishing and just messing around outside after work! I received product at discounted price in exchange for my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: BranG

customer_reviews.title: So far my 14 year old son likes them. ...
customer_reviews.text: So far my 14 year old son likes them. It is too early to know the long term result this is why I gave it 4 stars. Otherwise, they are made very well and serves the purpose for my son's issue with his open growth plate in both heels of his feet due to rapid growth spurts. It causes him pain similar to plantar fasciitis so he really needs reliable products.
customer_reviews.author: HonestReviewsOnly

customer_reviews.title: These insoles do not have any give. You might ...
customer_reviews.text: These insoles do not have any give. You might has well have hard custom orthotics. I felt so much pressure against my arch, my feet were killing me after 5 minutes of walking. I thought perhaps they were too wide along the arch an maybe tilted in my shoe so I trimmed enough off to make them narrower following the pattern of the insole that I had removed from the shoes. Still no luck, way too high in the arch area for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Rios

customer_reviews.title: Feels Commfortable
customer_reviews.text: These feel comfortable and the arch support is noticeable. You do need a sharp pair of scissors to trim them to the correct size for your shoes.
customer_reviews.author: J Charles Parker II

customer_reviews.title: Helps tremendously with plantars fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: These were a Christmas gift for my husband. He has been plagued with planters fasciitis for quite awhile. These insoles have helped him tremendously. He is very active, and even after playing basketball or golf his heels are not hurting like they used to. He switches them from shoe to shoe, but we are considering just buying more to fit in all his shoes. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Burke

customer_reviews.title: That's what I was looking for they look like they're going to work out perfect for me thank ...
customer_reviews.text: That's what I was looking for they look like they're going to work out perfect for me thank you very much. Please have your delivery service ring the doorbell I have been sick and home for the last 3 weeks and the doorbell has never rang when they drop off a package.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Verna

customer_reviews.title: I thought they were great...
customer_reviews.text: Until I realized the green insert component in the front of the shoe wasn't actually from the shoe. The forefoot sole pad under the orthotic becomes dislodged from the entire product after first use. I've tried SIX of these and they all do the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Colby Satterfield

customer_reviews.title: Good arch support, fits well
customer_reviews.text: I he had trouble with plantar fasciitis and believe these insoles will certainly help. I had acupuncture treatments, which helped greatly, and the doctor thought these insoles would help. I've been using them since, and have had no more trouble. Of course, it takes a few days to get used to having them.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Rowland

customer_reviews.title: same results as the expensive insoles,at a fraction of the cost...gonna order more so I can stop swapping insoles to other shoes
customer_reviews.text: got them in my shoes and they feel as good as the 99 dollar pr I just tossed out. extremely diminished pain and i'm sure as my foot adjusts to the correct conditions the pain will be a thing of the past.. thank you so much... i actually felt like going for a walk when my wife asked this time....
customer_reviews.author: Raymond A Landolfi

customer_reviews.title: Decent!
customer_reviews.text: There ok better than the 10+ other ones i got from local store trying to solve my foot issue..so far these are ok in my Ariat boots at work.
customer_reviews.author: jjhanz

customer_reviews.title: Too much arch
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice insoles, very good quality. However, they are too bulky under the arch of the foot. There's too much arch support for my foot. I'm finding them very uncomfortable to wear. I've tried to shave down the material using a sharp knife. But at this point I'm giving up on them. If you have a very high arch foot, go for it. But if your foot is flat or low arch, I would stay away from these insoles.
customer_reviews.author: J. Foley

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased, but I'm still in the "getting used to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first try with orthotics. The podiatrist says I need surgery for bunyons caused by my flat feet. I'm in my sixties. I went in because of heel pain. I don't want to have surgery for many reasons. My chiropractor suggested orthotics. He sells them, but that day he was out of my size, so I went searching online. I chose yours. So far, I am pleased, but I'm still in the "getting used to them" phase. It would be great if they help my hip pain as I see others have mentioned. Anyway... so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Goode

customer_reviews.title: Ordered for 12yo son - no more heel pain!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son kept describing heel pain exactly where my plantar fasciitis pains me. I hoped he didn’t inherit my father’s and my misfortune, but ordered him these for his running shoes. It seems to have done the trick! No more heel pain and he keeps thanking me for making his shoes so much more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: craftbeerbetty

customer_reviews.title: Cured my Mortons neuroma!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for Mortons neuroma. Can't live without these. My right foot was so bad, it got so I couldn't wear a shoe. My chiropractor suggested these and now I have no pain or tingling.
customer_reviews.author: Stable Lady

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for taking away my foot pain!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very demanding job that is very hard on my feet. I wear very uncomfortable heavy work boots. Over time I have developed plantar fasciitis which caused some of the worse pain I have ever experienced. This condition left me immobile for the most part until I found these orthotics. In just a day of wearing them i feel absolutely no pain. I don't know what I would do if I did not find these orthotics on Amazon. They are absolutely amazing!!!! Thank you VIVE HEALTH!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: Great for sore feet from long sports practice
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who has high arches and was having foot/heel pain after long soccer practices. After switching to these inserts, his pain has disappeared. Product is high quality and provides good support for his feet. He says they are very comfortable and asked for a second set for his regular shoes. Arrived quickly - would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great support No pain
customer_reviews.text: Put these in some boots I bought that came with absolutely no support what so ever. (Gotta love this crap from China ☹) They make my feet feel wonderful with no pain ☺.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Berns

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the product long enough to decide how much I like it but, so far, i am enjoying the way they make my feet feel. The service was perfect and I received the arch supports in a very timely matter. Overall, I am happy and would refer to anybody who asks.
customer_reviews.author: James Orloff

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far they have helped my plantar fasciitis. I would recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Huskins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and will become a repeat customer of this product, quick service and a great product"
customer_reviews.author: Sherrct

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable inserts. Help with plantar fasciitis. The only downside is that the two cushions on the bottom-side of the inserts do not stay in place. This won't be a problem if you put the inserts in one pair of shoes and leave them there. However if you intend to switch them in/out to different shoes, the cushions slip out of place.
customer_reviews.author: annmarie

customer_reviews.title: They were very easy to cut to size for my shoes
customer_reviews.text: These arrived quickly and were well packaged. They were very easy to cut to size for my shoes. In the beginning, they hurt my foot, but as I used them for a few days, I find they have really helped with my plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: These were a lifesaver !! I stand at least 8 hours for my work shifts and wasn't really wanting to find a pair of shoes that were only good for work. These I can put in all my closed toe shoes and definitely prevents all the muscle cramps and heal aches that I was having before. Thank you so much ! It really helped. I promise these will work great for you if you are struggling to find great arch support. A little tricky to get them in all the way at first but have been great since.
customer_reviews.author: alayna

customer_reviews.title: Felt covered cardboard
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! No padding at all A piece of cardboard with a felt cover. Dollar store inserts are better quality. The worst product I’ve ever gotten from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: oldfastpat

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These seemed to hurt my plantar fasciitis more. Very stiff and hard. I like more of a foam feel that gives in when I walk. This has no give whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis N.

customer_reviews.title: You’ll be back for more!
customer_reviews.text: Looks be these insoles. My heel pain was gone almost overnight after fussing with the pain for months. I just ordered two more sets so I have them ready to go in my favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great insole
customer_reviews.text: These are much cheaper than ones I’ve used previously but work for my feet just as well. I’ve purchased more!
customer_reviews.author: A. Rookus

customer_reviews.title: Too Bulky
customer_reviews.text: These help provide some support. But too bulky in my shoes and made my feet swell.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Good comfort at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased similar products from sports medicine doctors after a bout with Plantar Fasciitis. These are very comfortable and are as good as the more expensive brands. I wear them inside my steel toe work boots all day and don't have any problems. I would recommend them to anyone, especially if you have some foot discomfort and those in store versions have not helped.
customer_reviews.author: jtcsrtx

customer_reviews.title: Has been a good purchase for me.
customer_reviews.text: Advised to use this type of shoe insert by doctor for foot pain & overcompensation in walking gait. As advertised. Installed in a commonly use pair of shoes. Working well. Has definitely help my foot discomfort & improved my gait - less bowlegged. Would buy again & probably will at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Holly A. Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product...and you can’t even return them.
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely awful. There is nothing to them. Wore them for 2 days and they are already flat and falling apart. Went to send them back and you can’t even fill out a form to return for being defective! Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Bredalu82

customer_reviews.title: Need more arch support
customer_reviews.text: The insoles provide good support and are comfortable to use. However, I have very high arches and these do not quite provide the support I need.
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Very good insoles
customer_reviews.text: I put these in my mocs because I didn't want to give them up when diagnosed with PF...they really help.
customer_reviews.author: Gina H.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a full insert that would give my feet the comfortable arch and heel support to alleviate heel and sciatic nerve pain. So far these seem to meet that need.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Hard sole
customer_reviews.text: iF you like hard soles you will probably love this one. The arch of definitely built up and you can feel that. Takes some getting used to but is pretty supportive. Went on a 3 day hiking trip right after my got these abs they worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Jez

customer_reviews.title: The Best Inserts
customer_reviews.text: These inserts are awesome and they are affordable! Out of all the inserts I've tried, these have worked the best for plantar fasciitis. I have no pain. Of course, you also need a good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: AJR

customer_reviews.title: Not for people with naturally flat feet!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these insoles because they say they're for flat feet and conditions that are a result of such. Unfortunately they made my feet hurt so bad. It was excruciating! I'm sure they are good for people with fallen arches. I would suggest putting that in the description. I would have returned them but restalking fee would have been half the cost of what I paid. In short if you were born with flat feet don't buy the green pair.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Morriss

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son’s football cleats and he loves them. Trimmed them down to size 6 per the outline on the bottom of the support and they fit perfectly. Great arch support at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: krogersmn

customer_reviews.title: Good arch support for running or walking
customer_reviews.text: This is a good insert for high arches. Good support and cushioning. The product came as described and delivered fast.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Thorn

customer_reviews.title: Arch support
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good inserts for flat shoes. They are a foam texture so they may make your feet sweat
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: One foot w/ Plantars...other foot in pain from insoles
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning these insoles because I have plantars fasciitis in one foot so the other foot really hurts when I wear these inserts. There is not much padding on these. I'm bummed, but these just didn't work out for me.
customer_reviews.author: KRae

customer_reviews.title: I love them. I run 9-11 miles each day. I can't imagine not using them
customer_reviews.text: I love the. I find them perfect for work and walking or hiking and running. Initially I did not think that they were right for my run, but am now a believer!Great value!!
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.text: My dad suffers from plantar fasciitis and this insoles truly made a difference in his step. After wearing them for just one day, he noticed such a relief and was able to walk for longer periods of time. Definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: This is a lot of arch support
customer_reviews.text: I must have ordered the wrong inserts, these were very uncomfortable for my feet. I will say they were very well constructed for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Barberbrown

customer_reviews.title: plantar fascilities insoles
customer_reviews.text: The plantar fascilitis insoles don't fit the shoes of the same size (the difference is close to 2 sizes). Because the material is not soft it is unable to be bend like other inserts. Therefore, even if the size difference is minimal, they won't fit shoes as long as it is slightly bigger than the size. How do i return it?
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Tan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and they work.
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as SuperFeet inserts, but just about as good for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

product_meta.title: ViveSole Plantar Fasciitis Insoles - Foot Arch Support Orthotic - Firm Foam Shoe Inserts for Men, Woman, Work, Running - Fits Boots and Sneakers
feature_bullets: PODIATRIST DESIGNED: Effectively supporting the natural shape of your foot, the ViveSole Plantar Series biomechanical design relieves foot pain and eliminates painful pressure points, stress and fatigue. The full-length orthotic insoles effectively stabilize the foot to relieve heel and metatarsal pain caused by flat feet and overpronation.

PLANTAR FASCIITIS RELIEF: Specifically designed to relieve plantar fasciitis pain, the orthotic shoe inserts comfortably support the foot arch while providing shock absorbing cushioning at the heel and forefoot.

SHOCK ABSORBING CUSHIONS: Absorbing the impact of each step, the orthotic shoe inserts include additional cushioning on the forefoot and heel to minimize stress and fatigue. Comfortably padded the foot arch inserts are also helpful in alleviating knee, hip and back pain.

LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN: Constructed with a lightweight foam, the durable insoles retain their shape without flattening for extended wearability and are washable. Each insole is lined with a soft, breathable material.
VIVE GUARANTEE: 60 day unconditional guarantee so you can purchase now with confidence.
